Function Documentation

importGlobalVariable ( $  variable  ) 

importGlobalVariable solves the different global variable names in different versions of php original idea by Chris Burkert

Variable Documentation

$CARE_SERVER_VARS = &importGlobalVariable('server')

$HTTP_COOKIE_VARS = &importGlobalVariable('cookie')

$reg_glob_ini = ini_get('register_globals')

This routine will check whether the register_globals of php is on or off. If it is off, all GET,POST, and COOKIE variables will be explicitely 'globalized' here Note: this uses the $$ variable which will not work in php3
